Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Battlefield Incursion

  1. Relentless Invasion returns Wipeout to the battlefield, I flip him to Bot mode, and attack with him. After he gets pulled back under Trypticon, I use Battlefield Incursion the next turn to replay him. Does Wipeout enter the battlefield in Bot mode or Alt mode?
    Alt mode.
  2. Can I play Battlefield Incursion if there are no characters under my Trypticon?
    You can. It wonâ€™t have any effect itself, but other cards may have effects that depend on you playing Actions.
